.. py:class:: F2kcli


   Bases: :py:obj:`ContextManager`

   Fortran 200x Command Line Interface (Python version)
   Provides methods to access command-line arguments in a way similar to the Fortran F2KCLI module.

   .. method:: getCommand(command: Optional[list] = None, length: Optional[list] = None, status: Optional[list] = None) -> None

      Returns the entire command by which the program was invoked.

   .. method:: commandArgumentCount() -> int

      Returns the number of command arguments (excluding the program name).

   .. method:: getCommandArgument(number: int, value: Optional[list] = None, length: Optional[list] = None, status: Optional[list] = None) -> None

      Returns a specific command argument by index.


   .. py:method:: __enter__() -> F2kcli

      Return `self` upon entering the runtime context.


   .. py:method:: __exit__(exc_type, exc_val, exc_tb) -> Optional[bool]

      Raise any exception triggered within the runtime context.


   .. py:method:: getCommand(command: Optional[list] = None, length: Optional[list] = None, status: Optional[list] = None) -> None
      :staticmethod:

      Returns the entire command by which the program was invoked.

      :param command: A single-element list to store the command string.
      :type command: list, optional
      :param length: A single-element list to store the length of the command string.
      :type length: list, optional
      :param status: A single-element list to store the status code (0 for success).
      :type status: list, optional


   .. py:method:: commandArgumentCount() -> int
      :staticmethod:

      Returns the number of command arguments (excluding the program name).

      :returns: Number of command-line arguments (not counting the program name).
      :rtype: int


   .. py:method:: getCommandArgument(number: int, value: Optional[list] = None, length: Optional[list] = None, status: Optional[list] = None) -> None
      :staticmethod:

      Returns a command argument by index.

      :param number: The argument index (0 for program name, 1..N for arguments).
      :type number: int
      :param value: A single-element list to store the argument value.
      :type value: list, optional
      :param length: A single-element list to store the length of the argument value.
      :type length: list, optional
      :param status: A single-element list to store the status code (0 for success, 1 for out-of-range).
      :type status: list, optional
